original_title: Japanese Foreign Minister arrives in Sri Lanka
original_body_lines: Japanese Foreign Minister Hayashi Yoshimasa arrived in Sri Lanka a short while ago on a two-day official visit, the President's Media Division said.

During the visit, the Japanese Foreign Minister is scheduled to have official discussions with  Foreign Affairs Minister  Ali Sabry at the Ministry and pay courtesy calls on President Ranil Wickremesinghe and Prime Minister Dinesh Gunawardena.
